call_summary.final_outcome: The caller requested to speak with specific staff members. The receptionist determined they were unavailable and offered a transfer to voicemail. The call disconnected while the receptionist was requesting the caller's phone number, so the transfer was not initiated and no message was completed.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist offered a transfer to voicemail after confirming staff unavailability, but the call ended before the transfer was initiated.
